about.title: About Smiling Axolotl
about.description: We're a passionate team of Roblox developers who understand what makes games truly engaging. Our studio combines creativity with technical expertise to deliver experiences that players love and remember.

concerts.title:
Virtual Concerts
& Events
concerts.desc: Live music performances and interactive events that bring thousands of players together in unforgettable experiences.

Branded
Experiences
experiences.desc: Custom immersive worlds that showcase your brand's identity and engage with millions of active Roblox users.
